original_text: All the people of Israel have turned away from your laws. We have refused to obey you. Your servant Moses gave us your laws. He warned us about your punishments. Now you have punished us in the way that he said. We have turned away from you.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 주의 율법을 범하고 치우쳐 가서 주의 목소리를 듣지 아니하였으므로 이 저주가 우리에게 내렸으되 곧 하나님의 종 모세의 율법에 기록된 맹세대로 되었사오니 이는 우리가 주께 범죄하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: All the people of Israel have turned away
We have refused to obey you
Your servant Moses gave us your laws
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 종 모세가 우리에게 당신의 법을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: He warned us about your punishments
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리에게 당신의 벌에 대해 경고했습니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that he said
We have turned away from you
